Package de.f0rce.signaturepad

Class SignaturePad

java.lang.Object
com.vaadin.flow.component.Component
de.f0rce.signaturepad.SignaturePad
All Implemented Interfaces:
com.vaadin.flow.component.AttachNotifier, com.vaadin.flow.component.DetachNotifier, com.vaadin.flow.component.HasElement, java.io.Serializable
@Tag("signature-widget")
@JsModule("./@f0rce/signature-widget.js")
@NpmPackage(value="signature_pad",
            version="3.0.0-beta.4")
public class SignaturePad
extends com.vaadin.flow.component.Component
Main class with all methods.

    • setThrottle

      public void setThrottle​(int throttle)
      Sets the throttle, which will draw the next point at most once per every x milliseconds. Set it to 0 to turn off throttling. Defaults to 16.
      Parameters:
      throttle - int
